English:
Ah!
That! Look at that, Yuuko!
Chinese:
啊！？
那個！！小悠子，妳看看那個！！
Korean:
앗!?
저거!! 저것 좀 봐봐, 유콧치!!
German:
Ah!
Da! Schau dir das an, Yuuko!

English: I don't know why, but we gotta get out of here!
Chinese: 雖然搞不太懂，但我不會讓他逃走的～～～！！
German: Ich weiß nicht, warum, aber wir müssen hier weg!

English:
Let's go, Yuuko!
Let's follow pretty [p]!
Chinese:
走囉，小悠子！
去追Pretty☆[p]吧！

English: That's... that's it! I remember now.
German: Das ... das ist es! Jetzt weiß ich es wieder.

English:
Yuugo and Arata were saying that
they had found something "interesting"...
Chinese:
哥哥和新……
說是發現了“有趣的東西”……
German:
Yuugo und Arata meinten, sie hätten etwas
„Interessantes“ gefunden ...

English:
Oh, crap, what are you doing, Yuuko?
Our prey is getting away!
Chinese:
喂，小悠子，妳在做什麼啊！？
獵物要逃走了唷！？
Korean:
정말이지, 뭐하고 있어 유콧치!?
먹이가 도망쳐 버린다구!?
German:
Ach, Mist, was machst du denn, Yuuko?
Das Kleine haut ab!
